original_title: Hooked on Comix - Volume 1 - Life On The Cutting Edge Of An All-American Artform
overview: "... It's heartening to see so much talent and dedication at work in the under-appreciated medium of personal, as opposed to corporate, comics. I also enjoyed watching so many introverts (I oughta know) squirming in front of the camera, valiantly trying to explain the unexplainable." - Bill Griffith, creator of Zippy the Pinhead
title: Hooked on Comix - Volume 1 - Life On The Cutting Edge Of An All-American Artform
